text: Læa cng raluk thung khna thi rea di hı ban hlang nan pen thi klab ma sahrab mnusʹy læa pen thi plxdphay læa phwk cea cng yud xea pen thi yun khx ngxi brxhim pen thi lahmad theid læa rea di sang seiy kæ xi brxhim læa xis ma xi l wa cea thang sxng cng thakhwam saxad ban khxng kha pheux brrda phu tha kar deaa waf læa brrda phu tha kar xei ya ti kaf læa brrda phu thi tha ruka wa læa su yud
